remarks: Value of the kernel of a functional.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lkrfval.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lkrfval.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lkrfval.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lkrfval.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lkrval $p |- ( ( W e. X /\ G e. F ) -> ( K ` G ) = ( `' G " { .0. } ) ) $.
